org.spongycastle.crypto.engines

Class NTRUEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spongycastle.crypto.engines.NTRUEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AsymmetricBlockCipher

    public class NTRUEngine
extends java.lang.Object
implements AsymmetricBlockCipher
    Encrypts, decrypts data and generates key pairs.
    The parameter p is hardcoded to 3.

      • processBlock

        public byte[] processBlock(byte[] in,
                  int inOff,
                  int len)
                    throws InvalidCipherTextException
        Description copied from interface: AsymmetricBlockCipher
        process the block of len bytes stored in in from offset inOff.
        Specified by:
        processBlock in interface AsymmetricBlockCipher
        Parameters:
        in - the input data
        inOff - offset into the in array where the data starts
        len - the length of the block to be processed.
        Returns:
        the resulting byte array of the encryption/decryption process.
        Throws:
        InvalidCipherTextException - data decrypts improperly.

        dr - number of ones / negative ones
        Returns:

      • decrypt

        private byte[] decrypt(byte[] data,
             NTRUEncryptionPrivateKeyParameters privKey)
                throws InvalidCipherTextException
        Decrypts a message.
        See P1363.1 section 9.2.3.
        Parameters:
        data - The message to decrypt
        privKey - the corresponding private key
        Returns:
        the decrypted message
        Throws:
        InvalidCipherTextException - if the encrypted data is invalid, or maxLenBytes is greater than 255

                        IntegerPolynomial priv_fp)
        Parameters:
        e -
        priv_t - a polynomial such that if fastFp=true, f=1+3*priv_t; otherwise, f=priv_t
        priv_fp -
        Returns:
